resources.string: Isibonisi se-braille sangaphandle sixhunyiwe, ongasisebenzisa ukuthayipha umbhalo kule divayisi.\nNoma, ungashintshela kukhibhodi ye-Braille yesikrini sokuthinta noma indlela yokufaka elandelay.
Ayikho enye ikhibhodi enikwe amandla, iya kuzilungiselelo zekhibhodi
Ayikwazanga ukubuyekeza ukuma kwechashazi. Thinta uphinde ubambe isikrini ngeminwe eyisi-6. Bese uzame futhi.
Ibuyekeza indawo yechashazi. Okokuqala, ake sirekhode amachashazi asesandleni sakho esingakwesokunxele. Thinta uphinde ubambe isikrini ngeminwe engaphakathi emi-3 yesandla sakho esingakwesokunxele.
Ibuyekeza indawo yechashazi. Okokuqala, asirekhode amachashazi asesandleni sakho esingakwesokudla. Thinta uphinde ubambe isikrini ngeminwe engaphakathi emi-3 yesandla sakho esingakwesokudla.

Ukuma okubuyekeziwe kwamachashazi 1, 2, no-3. Okulandelayo, asirekhode amachashazi asesandleni sakho esingakwesokunxele. Thinta uphinde ubambe isikrini ngeminwe engaphakathi emi-3 yesandla sakho esingakwesokunxele.

Ukuma okubuyekeziwe kwamachashazi 1, 2, no-3. Okulandelayo, asirekhode amachashazi asesandleni sakho esingakwesokudla. Thinta uphinde ubambe isikrini ngeminwe engaphakathi emi-3 yesandla sakho esingakwesokudla.
Ibonisa ikhibhodi ye-braille. Jikisa ifoni yakho ukuze isikrini sibheke kude nawe. Zungezisa ifoni ngokuvundlile ngokuma kokwakheka kwezwe. Bese uqala ukuthayipha.
Ukuze ususe igama, swayiphela ngakwesokunxele ngeminwe engu-2
Ukuze ufihle ikhibhodi, swayiphela phansi ngeminwe engu-2
Ukuze uhambise i-cursor yombhalo emuva, swayiphela phezulu
Ukuze uhambise i-cursor yombhalo phambili, swayiphela phansi
Ukuthola ulayini omusha, swayiphela ngakwesokudla ngeminwe engu-2
Ukushintshela kwikhibhodi elandelayo, swayiphela ngenzansi ngeminwe engu-3
Ukuthola usizo nezinye izinketho, swayiphela phezulu ngeminwe engu-3
%s\nBeka phansi idivayisi yakho etafuleni. Bese, uthinta uphinde ubambe isikrini ngeminwe emi-3 engaphakathi yesandla ngasinye ngokuma okhululeke ukuthayipha ngakho.
Ngeke ukwazi ukusebenzisa ukuthinta kwe-TalkBack okuvamile kwikhibhodi ye-braille.\n\nUkuze uqalise, asisethe ukuma kwamachashazi we-braille ayi-6 lapho uthayipha.
Beka phansi idivayisi yakho etafuleni. Bese, uthinta uphinde ubambe isikrini ngeminwe emi-3 engaphakathi yesandla ngasinye ngokuma okhululeke ukuthayipha ngakho.
Ikhobhodi ye-TalkBack - ukuthola usizo, vakashela ku-g.co/help/braille
Ukuze uhambise i-cursor yombhalo phambili, swayiphela phansi
Ukufihla ikhibhodi, swayipha ngenzansi ngeminwe engu-2
Ukushintshela kwenye ikhibhodi yakho, swayipha ngenzansi ngeminwe engu-3
Ukuze uhambise i-cursor yombhalo emuva, swayiphela phezulu
Ukuqeda okokufundisa, swayipha phezulu ngeminwe engu-3
Thepha ichashazi 1 ngomunwe wakho wenkomba ongakwesokunxele ukuthayipha uhlamvu \"A\"
Okulandelayo, zama ukuthayipha amaletha athi B, C, no-D
Idivayisi yakho ayisekeli amaphoyinti wokuthinta anele. Ukuthola ulwazi olwengeziwe, xhumana nomkhiqizi wedivayisi yakho

Imenyu yezinketho ivuliwe. Jikisa ifoni yakho ibeke ngakuwe bese uyibamba ngendlela evamile. Manje usungakwazi ukusebenzisa ukuthinta kwe-TalkBack ukuzulazula. Swayiphela ngakwesokudla ukuze ubone okunye okungakhethwa.
Swayipha phezulu ngeminwe engu-3 ukuthola okunye okungakhethwa
Kusukela manje, ngeke ukwazi ukusebenzisa ukuthinta okuvamile kwe-TalkBack. I-TalkBack ayitholakali uma usebenzisa ikhibhodi ye-braille.\n\n%1$s

Ifoni yakho iqondile. Ukuze uqhubeke, zungezisa ifoni yakho ivundle ukuze uhlangothi olude lube ngenzansi. Lokhu kujikisa isikrini ukuze singabheki ngakuwe. Lapho usukulungele, thepha kabili isikrini ukuze uqhubeke.
Kusuka manje, ngeke ukwazi ukusebenzisa ukuthinta okuvamile kwe-TalkBack. I-TalkBack ayitholakali lapho usebenzisa ikhibhodi ye-braille.
Ukuqala, bamba ifoni yakho ngale ndlela, isikrini sibheke kude nawe.

Okokuqala, jikisa ifoni yakho ukuze isikrini sibheke kude nawe.
\Okulandelayo, zungezisa ifoni ngokuvundlile ukuze ibe ukuma okundlaleke ngobubanzi. Izandla zakho kufanele zibambe amaphethelo amafushane wefoni. Isandla sakho sokudla kufanele sibambe ekugcineni ngembobo ye-USB. Phumuza iminwe yakho engaphakathi engu-3 kusikrini, futhi usebenzise ucikicane nesithupha sakho ukusekela ifoni.

Lapho usukulungele, thepha kabili kusikrini ukuze uqhubeke.

Ukuphuma kukhibhodi ye-braille, swayipha ngenzansi kuya phansi ngeminwe engu-3. Lokhu kushintshela kwikhibhodi yakho evamile.
Ichashazi ngalinye elicindezelwe liyingxenye yokokufaka, ngisho noma ichashazi likhishwe ngaphambi kwamanye amachashazi
Ngokwesibonelo, shintsha izindawo zechashazi, ukuze amachashazi 1 no-4 ashintshe izindawo
Ukufihla ikhibhodi, swayipha ngenzansi ngeminwe engu-2. Izame manje.
Fihla ikhibhodi. Ngokuvamile, lokhu kufihla ikhibhodi. Ikhibhodi ye-braille izohlala ivuliwe ngoba usephakathi nokokufundisa.
Ukushintshela kwenye ikhibhodi yakho, swayipha ngenzansi ngeminwe engu-3. Izame manje.
Ikhibhodi elandelayo. Ngokuvamile, lokhu kushintshela kwibhodi elandelayo. Manje, uzohlala kukhibhodi ye-braille ngoba usephakathi nokokufundisa.
Ukuze uhambise i-cursor yombhalo phambili, swayiphela phansi Izame manje.
Ukususa iletha, swayipha ngakwesokunxele. Izame manje.
Ukwengeza isikhala, swayipha ngakwesokudla Izame manje.
Ungase futhi uthayiphe kumodi ye-tabletop ngokubeka ifoni yakho phansi etafuleni. Ukuze uqedele okokufundisa, swayipha phezulu ngeminwe emi-3, bese uthola inketho yokokufundisa yokuqedela
Ukuze uhambise i-cursor yombhalo emuva, swayiphela phezulu Izame manje.
Ukuze ushintshe ulimi lwakho ngenkathi uthayipha ngekhibhodi ye-braille, swayiphela phezulu ngeminwe emi-3. Bese ukhetha okuthi \"shintshela olimini olulandelayo\".
Imodi ye-tabletop. Beka idivayisi yakho nembobo yokushaja ngakwesokunxele. Ukuze ubuyekeze ukuma kwechashazi, cindezela iminwe eyi-6.
Uma i-TalkBack ivuliwe, ungathepha isikrini sakho ukuze ufake amasimbuli e-braille.
Qhubeka ne-TalkBack ukuze usebenzise ikhibhothi ye-braille

Ngekhibhodi ye-braille, ungathepha isikrini sakho ukuze ufake i-braille yamachashazi ayi-6.

Awusebenzisi i-Unified English Braille. Ukuze ushintshe ulimi lwakho lokuthayipha, iya kumasethingi e-TalkBack.

Ukuze uthayiphe i-braille, kudingeka ubambe futhi usebenzise ifoni yakho ngokwehlukile.

Gcina isikrini sibheke kude nawe. Bamba ifoni yakho ngazo zombili izandla, kunqenqema olufushane lwefoni, ukuze iminwe engu-3 emaphakathi yesandla ngasinye ikwazi ukuthinta isikrini.\n\nUmunwe wakho oyinkomba ongakwesokunxele kufanele ube echashazini 1. Manje, thepha ichashazi 1 ukuthayipha iletha “A”.
Thepha ichashazi 1 ngomunwe wakho oyinkomba ongakwesokunxele ukuthayipha “A”

1. Vula ikhibhodi ye-braille: Thepha okuthi Izilungiselelo ngezansi. Kusikrini esilandelayo, vula i-\"%1$s.\"

2. Sebenzisa ikhibhodi ye-braille: Vula ikhibhodi yakho evamile, bese uthepha isithonjana esithi khetha ikhibhodi %2$s (ngokuvamile siba kwikhona elingezansi ngakwesokudla). Khetha i-\"%1$s.\"

Uma ungayiboni inketho yokushintsha amakhibhodi, zama ukufaka %3$s, ikhibhodi ye-Google.

Ukusebenzisa ikhibhodi ye-braille, vula ikhibhodi yakho evamile, bese uthepha isithonjana esithi khetha ikhibhodi%1$s (ngokuvamile siba kwikhona elingezansi ngakwesokudla). Khetha \"%2$s.\"

Uma ungayiboni inketho yokushintsha amakhibhodi, zama ukufaka %3$s, ikhibhodi ye-Google.
